scripts.docker:update: docker-compose run rails bundle install && docker-compose run rails yarn install
scripts.docker:clean: docker volume ls | grep automatching | cut -b 21- | xargs docker volume rm
scripts.db:create: docker-compose run rails env RAILS_ENV=development rails db:create
scripts.db:recovery: docker-compose run rails env RAILS_ENV=development rails db:recovery
scripts.db:migrate: docker-compose run rails env RAILS_ENV=development rails db:migrate
scripts.db:seed: docker-compose run rails env RAILS_ENV=development rails db:seed
